price: ከገንዘቦቻቸው ስትኾን በእርሷ የምታጠራቸውና የምታፋፋቸው የኾነችን ምጽዋት ያዝ፡፡ ለነሱም ዱኣ አድርግላቸው፡፡ ዱኣእህ ለእነሱ እርጋታ ነውና አላህም ሰሚ ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
arabic: خُذۡ مِنۡ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ صَدَقَةٗ تُطَهِّرُهُمۡ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٞ لَّهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: khudh min amwālihim ṣadaqatan tuṭahhiruhum watuzakkīhim bihā waṣalli ʿalayhim inna ṣalataka sakanun lahum wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
